You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:

I also listed all files in the current directory using the ls -la command. \n\nIn the latest development, I executed the command execute_shell to change the directory to images. Then, I extracted the jpg_files.tar.gz archive using the tar command and moved the jpg_files directory to the images directory.
